race.name: Avilus
entries: Optimistic songbirds that are just as likable as they are fast.

entries.name: Age
entries: Most avilus live to about 150â€“200 years, aging only once they have about a decade left to live.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: All avilus are good without a doubt, but while most are lawful, a few adventurers lean chaotic.

entries.name: Avian Anatomy
entries: Your wings act as your hands for wielding weapons and casting spells. While flying or hovering, you can only take the Attack action with undersized weapons, using your toes to hold or draw them.

entries.name: Overwhelming Positivity
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill Persuasion} skill. You may double your proficiency bonus when making a Persuasion check on a creature currently in a negative emotional state (such as depression or anger).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Auran.

Avilus are small, intelligent birds created long ago by a lonely wizard who accidentally granted a bird sentience. Since then, they have spread across the Material Plane and even into the Elemental Plane of Air.
They hide their intellect from most other races, but are known for their radiant positivity and their tendency to cheer up those who are sad or angry.

entries.name: Society
entries: Avilus live among other races, often acting as companions or counselors. They keep their ability to speak secret, but sometimes reveal it to comfort others.

entries.name: Names
entries: Avilus adopt the first names of other races, such as human, elven, or dwarven names.

entries.name: Male Names
entries: Aseir, Bardeid, Adran, Quarion, Taklinn, Timu, Thorin

entries.name: Female Names
entries: Atala, Ceidil, Jelenneth, Thia, Kathra, Mardred
